projects.title: Work processes of service for maintenance vehicles
projects.description:
In the final work, "Work processes of service for maintenance vehicles" both, theoretical
knowledge and practical experience, have been applied. Work involves a complex workflow of
service that is mostly seen as a purely technical process. It was also the initial thesis. Basic principle of operation of the service is exposed on the example of the work-order from the
view of the service advisers. It is proved that for a successful business technical knowledge and
skills are not enough but also it is necessary an application of knowledge in management,
organization and quality control.

contributors.headline: Operations Manager at Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center Maastricht - Warranty Claim Assessment Overseas PC/VAN

projects.title: Analysis and  improvement suggestions for service processes
projects.description:
• Situation analysis 
• SWOT analysis 
• Proposed solutions for work processes
• Proposed solutions for service application
• Proposed solutions for time keeping management and statistics
• Proposed solutions for improvement of service indicators (efficiency, effectiveness and productivity)
• Implementation of proposed solutions for service application, statistics management and service work processes

contributors.headline: Operations Manager at Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center Maastricht - Warranty Claim Assessment Overseas PC/VAN

company.name: Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center Maastricht NV

profile_positions.company: Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center Maastricht NV
profile_positions.description: We are responsible for the worldwide warranty and goodwill business for Mercedes-Benz passenger cars including Maybach and Smart as well as VANs. Our main target is to ensure a professional warranty and goodwill process is in place and operated by our Retail Network, to maintain the high levels of customer service we expect for our customers.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.company: Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center Maastricht NV
profile_positions.description:
Controlling of complex and high value warranty and goodwill claims assuring they meet current Daimler regulation. The department is responsible for the worldwide warranty and goodwill business for Mercedes-Benz passenger cars including Maybach and Smart. Main target is to ensure a professional warranty and goodwill processing by Retail Network maintaining high level of customer service and also ensuring adequate compensation is offered.

Assigned for CZ, UK and ROW market parameter controlling setting. Spacialized in topic of body work and corrosion. 
Supporting team work processes, audits and knowledge database.
profile_positions.title: Senior Technical Service Representative - Warranty Claim Assessment

company.name: ING ADITUM, for Consulting and Fleet Management

profile_positions.company: ING ADITUM, for Consulting and Fleet Management
profile_positions.description:
External assistance for small and mid-sized companies, helping them to improve work processes and properly manage the fleet, special project or new strategic initiative. Our GPS tracking system can help you optimize every aspect of your fleet operations. See our web page for more details and for GPS tracking DEMO version. Note that our tracking system is a modern fully-featured web interface with both desktop and mobile-friendly layouts with mobile APP for Android and iOS platforms. 

ING ADITUM, Consulting and Fleet Management 
T: +385 91 530 2622 | M: info@ing-aditum.hr 
Web: https://ing-aditum.hr
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all aspects of Acquisition, Operational Management and Risk Management including fleet forecasting, purchasing, maintenance, accident claims and repair, and well as the vehicles resale. Analysis and improvement suggestions for work processes, procedures and policies.
As Fleet Manager I was responsible ensuring all company vehicles-operational in Croatia, Austria, France, Switzerland and Germany-have minimal downtime to maximise business productivity and growth of current fleet of luxury vehicles.
profile_positions.title: Fleet Manager

profile_positions.description: The HQ Logistics Department role is to ensure the support and supervision to field mission logistics teams and provide guidance related to the implementation of the logistics procedures. Support activities cover procurement planning and execution, import/export activities, cargo shipping, transport management, support to distribution and distribution reporting, HazMat and Dangerous goods management, vehicle managment, asset management, equipment servicing and additional logistic support as needs arise.
profile_positions.title: Logistic officer - Global logistic department

company.name: Official Mercedes Benz service "AK Vrdoljak", Split, Croatia, EU

profile_positions.company: Official Mercedes Benz service "AK Vrdoljak", Split, Croatia, EU
profile_positions.description:
• Workshop managing processes for Mercedes-Benz, SLR, Maybach, SMART, commercial vehicles (Trucks, Vans, Busses)  and Mitsubishi Fuso,
• Management of key customers
• Service contracts management and base expansion responsibility,
• Coordination of workshop personnel, productivity and quality control,
• Direct work with clients, external services and suppliers, control of offers and invoices,
• Management and planning of the book of orders and tracking of work orders, 
• Control of ordered parts in cooperation with a warehouse of spare parts and sales department,
• Technical Support; professional counseling and support of service work,
• Establishment of a functional MB special tools warehouse with digital database for quick survey,
• Periodic inspection of certificates, validity and calibration of workshops equipment,
• Warranty administration; managing and archiving of warranty and service-technical documentation,
• Management of bodywork repairs in coordination with insurance company's and bodywork shop
• Daily usage of WIS, EPC, EVA net, ODUS and other MB applications
profile_positions.title: Mercedes Benz Workshop Superintendent
